load_dictionary[source]

load_dictionary(fname)

Given a fname, function loads a pkl dictionary from the current directory

Args: fname ([str]): Enter the filename

Returns: [dict]: Returns the loaded pkl file as a dict

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def iterator(path):
    for fx in os.listdir(path):
        if fx.endswith('.pkl'):
            d = load_dictionary(path+fx)
            
        if fx.endswith('_norm.npy'):
            pmi = load_pmi(path+fx)
            
        if fx.endswith('lexical.txt'):
            data = get_data(path+fx)
            sentences = split_by_newline(data)
            
    return pmi, d, sentences
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
